item.title: Decreasing Consumption, Increasing Happiness
item.description: “It’s time to stop pointing fingers, finger pointing gets us no-where, Steve!” ~ Randy Marsh, South Park In the past year I have reduced my carbon footprint to about 10% that of an average American without much effort. How? Before telling other people how to live, I have found it is a good idea to examine my life thoroughly first. I know, I know– where is the fun in that?
